title: SHOW/DESC PIPE[S] commands: New column in output | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_07 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the output of the SHOW PIPES
and DESCRIBE PIPE commands will include the following new column:
The kind of the pipe, either KAFKA or STAGE.
